title: The Livestream Room Is Haunted
alternative_title: Am I Human or Not? [Live] ; The Livestream Room Is Haunted ; Wo Daodi Shi Bushi Ren.[Zhibo] ; Wǒ Dàodǐ Shì Bùshì Rén.[Zhíbò] ; 我到底是不是人 ; 我到底是不是人.[直播]
status: Am I Human or Not? [Live] ; The Livestream Room Is Haunted ; Wo Daodi Shi Bushi Ren.[Zhibo] ; Wǒ Dàodǐ Shì Bùshì Rén.[Zhíbò] ; 我到底是不是人 ; 我到底是不是人.[直播]
description:
Description :
        After the cracks appeared in the family jade pendant, the ordinary young man Yun Chuan became plagued by bad luck, and was even almost swallowed by a female ghost. He also accidentally triggered the mysterious dark live broadcast system and was forced to enter the world of the live broadcast room. , how will the seemingly weak Yunchuan survive from desperation?Can he successfully upgrade through the live broadcast room and find out the mystery of his life experience hidden behind the bad luck
